Official Hungaria Lottery  -  Live Everyday Hungaria Lottery Site

Win Your Daily Lucky Numbers.

Welcome to Official Hungaria Lottery, an legal lottery information site that provide lottery and such games results. As a member of the global lottery industry, the Lottery has a long history of being a strong supporter and promoter of responsible gaming. We are committed to the highest standards of responsible gaming to prevent problem gambling, which can adversely affect individuals and their families

For those of you who still think you can beat the odds, there is actually a strategy. The only sure way to win money playing the 4D Lottery is to buy ticket(s), each hand selected containing one of the unique numbers between 0000 and 9999.

This website is for the use of adults only. Individuals must be 18 years of age or older to participate in lottery, charitable gaming and in-store sports betting. Individuals must be 19 years of age or older to visit casinos and slot facilities, and to participate in online casino gaming and online sports betting.

How to Play 4D Lottery

When you have a winner, you win. When someone in your pool wins, you win. When someone in wins, you could win too. Best of all, it’s the only social game that could make you a millionaire!

LOTTERY GAME REVIEW

Pool 6D is a game in which you pick a 4-digit number.
